name: Campfire Keeper
description:
Returning home, you landed in a ravine. You were able to light a campfire, but you spent all the matches on it.

With such a temperature, it is impossible to stay out of heat for a long time, but in order to stretch until the morning you need to maintain a fire.

It is possible to find an axe. But shh, I didn't tell you that.

Control:

W/A/S/DPlayer movementE Interaction with objects

Goal - Survive as long as possible and climb to the top of the leaderboard.

The timer on top is the remaining time of the campfire. There is no visual timer for the freezing character. If the player stays out of the campfire for a long time, he will start to freeze and eventually the game will end.

Credits:

Main music: https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle

Lot of Sounds were taken frome stock sites (I don't remember what from where).

Campfire keeper was created for  Winter Jam by SoloDevelopment

https://itch.io/jam/winter-jam-by-solodevelopment
